title: PRETTYGARDEN Women's Summer Work Business Casual Dress 2025 Spring Bodycon Short Sleeve Sweater Cocktail Sheath Dress
description: Size: S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=US 16-18, XXL=US 20. Made of 72%Viscose and 28%Polyester, the fabric of this work dresses is skin friendly, soft, comfortable, breathable
Features: Short sleeve, crew neck, bodycon style, slim fit, knit, solid color, faux front pocket with gold crest buttons, short dress length for a look that feels tailored, elegant and vintage
Occasion: This classy business casual dress is the perfect choice for a casual daily, parties, vacation, wedding, holiday, school, clubs, offices, photoshoots, outdoor or shopping

Easy To Match: You can pair this sheath sweater dress with a necklace, hat, and heels to create a cocktail dress to attend wedding guests or create an office professional dresses look, effortlessly go from casual to formal
Washing Care: Machine wash with a laundry bag recommended, or hand wash in cold water, do not bleach, suggest hang or line dry
